txRejected.tx_rejected_info: Transacci贸 rebutjada per la clau SSP.
txRejected.tx_rejected_info_2: La teva transacci贸 no ser inclosa a la blockchain. Els teus fons estan totalment disponibles i es poden enviar.

publicNoncesRejected.public_nonces_rejected_info: Nonces p煤blics rebutjats per la clau SSP.
publicNoncesRejected.public_nonces_rejected_info_2: La clau SSP ha rebutjat enviar nonces p煤blics. Sense nonces p煤blics, SSP Wallet no pot construir transaccions a les cadenes EVM.

publicNoncesReceived.public_nonces_received_info: Els nonces p煤blics han estat rebuts i emmagatzemats amb 猫xit. Els nonces p煤blics s'utilitzen per construir transaccions a les cadenes EVM.

transactionsTable.no_tx_history: No s'ha trobat historial de transaccions
transactionsTable.tx_unconfirmed: No confirmat. La transacci贸 encara no s'ha mineria.
transactionsTable.tx_pending: Pendent. La transacci贸 est a l'espera de l'autoritzaci贸 de la clau SSP.
transactionsTable.replace_by_fee_info: Augmenta la taxa, substitueix o cancela la transacci贸.
transactionsTable.replace_by_fee_desc: Replace by Fee (RBF) et permet substituir una transacci贸 no confirmada per una altra que ofereixi una taxa m茅s alta. Si la teva transacci贸 es mant茅 no confirmada durant un per铆ode prolongat, podries considerar utilitzar la funci贸 RBF per augmentar la taxa de transacci贸. A m茅s, 茅s possible modificar el receptor, la quantitat o les notes de pagament. Enviant els fons a una de les teves adreces, tamb茅 pots cancel路lar la transacci贸.
transactionsTable.replace_by_fee_desc_b: RBF requereix una taxa de transacci贸 m茅s alta en qualsevol cas. La substituci贸 no est garantida i els productors de blocs, miners, poden seguir preferint la transacci贸 anterior. Nom茅s es poden substituir les transaccions no confirmades.
transactionsTable.err_export: Error en exportar transaccions. Si us plau, intenta-ho de nou.

nodesTable.name: Nom
nodesTable.start_node_info: Aquesta acci贸 transmetr la transacci贸 d'inici a la blockchain intentant iniciar el teu node {{chainName}}.
nodesTable.start_node_info_2: Assegura't que el teu node {{chainName}} estigui en funcionament i passant la prova abans d'iniciar el teu node per evitar l'estat DoS.
nodesTable.delete_node_info: Aquesta acci贸 far que el teu col路lateral de node {{chainName}} bloquejat estigui disponible per gastar.
nodesTable.delete_node_info_2: El teu node {{chainName}} continuar funcionant i es podr configurar de nou si el teu col路lateral del node no s'ha gastat.
nodesTable.open_fluxos_info: Aquesta acci贸 obrir FluxOS al teu navegador, minimitzant SSP Wallet.
nodesTable.err_start: Error en iniciar el node {{chainName}}. Assegura't que el teu col路lateral tingui 100 confirmacions, i que l'estat del node estigui offline, despr茅s intenta-ho de nou.
nodesTable.err_unable_identity: No es pot generar la identitat del node. Intenta-ho m茅s tard.
nodesTable.err_delete: Error en eliminar el node {{chainName}}. Si us plau, intenta-ho de nou.
nodesTable.add_to_flux_storage_info: Aquesta acci贸 carregar el teu node Flux configurat a Flux Storage. Es fa servir per simplificar la configuraci贸 del teu FluxOS. Se't presentar un identificador d'emmagatzematge per utilitzar en la configuraci贸 del teu FluxOS.
nodesTable.err_upload_storage: Error en carregar el node {{chainName}} a Flux Storage. Si us plau, intenta-ho de nou.
nodesTable.add_to_storage_added: El teu node Flux est disponible a Flux Storage, ara el pots utilitzar en la configuraci贸 del teu FluxOS.
nodesTable.add_to_storage_added_info: Copia la frase d'emmagatzematge Flux i utilitza-la en la configuraci贸 del teu FluxOS.

setupNode.err_saving_node: Error en desar el node. Si us plau, intenta-ho de nou.
setupNode.err_no_name: Si us plau, posa-li un nom al teu node primer

sspWalletDetails.err_invalid_wallet_xpriv_2: Xpriv de cartera no vlid, no es pot desencriptar.
sspWalletDetails.err_invalid_wallet_xpub_2: Xpub de cartera no vlid, no es pot desencriptar.
sspWalletDetails.err_invalid_wallet_seed_2: Sement de cartera no vlid, no es pot desencriptar
sspWalletDetails.err_invalid_wallet_xpub_id: Xpub de cartera d'identitat no vlid
sspWalletDetails.err_invalid_wallet_xpub_2_id: Xpub de cartera d'identitat no vlid, no es pot desencriptar.
sspWalletDetails.err_s1: Codi S1: Alguna cosa va sortir malament en desencriptar la contrasenya.
sspWalletDetails.ssp_mnemonic: Frase mnemot猫cnica de la cartera SSP
sspWalletDetails.ssp_sync_wallet_key: Sincronitzaci贸 SSP amb la clau SSP
sspWalletDetails.ssp_mnemonic_desc: La frase de sement 茅s la part m茅s important de la teva cartera. S'utilitza per derivar totes les teves claus privades i p煤bliques esteses. Si us plau, escriu-la i guarda-la de manera segura. Si perds la teva frase de sement, perdrs l'acc茅s als teus fons. NO la comparteixis amb ning煤 ja que atorga control total sobre la part de la cartera SSP.
sspWalletDetails.ssp_sync_wallet_key_desc: Aquest codi QR s'utilitza per sincronitzar la teva cartera SSP amb la teva clau SSP. Escaneja aquest codi QR amb la teva clau SSP per sincronitzar la teva cartera SSP amb la teva clau SSP. Tamb茅 sincronitza automticament la cadena de Bitcoin.
sspWalletDetails.chain_sync_ssp_key_desc: Aquest codi QR s'utilitza per sincronitzar la teva cartera SSP {{chain}} amb la teva clau SSP. Escaneja aquest codi QR amb la teva clau SSP per sincronitzar la teva cadena {{chain}}.
sspWalletDetails.chain_extended_pub_desc: La clau p煤blica estesa s'utilitza per derivar totes les teves claus p煤bliques {{chain}} a partir de les quals es construeixen les adreces. Aquesta 茅s una part p煤blica, segura de compartir, no atorga acc茅s als fons. Aix貌 茅s el que SSP Wallet sincronitza amb la teva clau SSP per generar adreces.
sspWalletDetails.chain_extended_priv_desc: La clau privada estesa s'utilitza per derivar totes les teves claus privades {{chain}} que controlen les teves claus p煤bliques - adreces. Aquesta 茅s una part privada, NO la comparteixis mai ja que atorga acc茅s als fons.

addressDetails.wallet_redeem_script_desc: El codi del gui贸 de rescat descriu les condicions que cal complir per gastar els fons de la teva cartera. Generalment mai no necessitars aquest codi, per貌 茅s bo tenir-lo guardat en algun lloc per si el necessites. s segur de compartir, no atorga control sobre els teus fons per貌 exposa les claus p煤bliques.
addressDetails.wallet_witness_script_desc: El codi del gui贸 de testimoni descriu les condicions que cal complir per gastar els fons de la teva cartera. Generalment mai no necessitars aquest codi, per貌 茅s bo tenir-lo guardat en algun lloc per si el necessites. s segur de compartir, no atorga control sobre els teus fons per貌 exposa les claus p煤bliques.
addressDetails.wallet_priv_key_desc: La clau privada atorga control sobre l'adre莽a espec铆fica de la teva cartera. Aquesta 茅s una part privada, NO la comparteixis mai ja que atorga acc茅s als fons.

settings.err_saving_conf: Error en desar la configuraci贸. Si us plau, intenta-ho de nou.
settings.public_nonces_sync_help: Public nonces are required for EVM transactions. This forces synchronisation of nonces from your SSP Key device to enable EVM transaction signing.

receive.wallet_address_desc: Aquesta 茅s la teva adre莽a de la cartera. Pots compartir aquesta adre莽a amb qui vulguis per rebre fons.
receive.warning_chain_only: This address is for the {{chain_name}} ({{chain_symbol}}) blockchain only. Only deposit assets on the {{chain_name}} ({{chain_symbol}}) chain to this address. Depositing from another chain will result in a loss of funds!
receive.address_info_block: Use this address only for the {{chain_name}} ({{chain_symbol}}) network. Each blockchain has its own unique address for security purposes. For cross-network transfers, please use bridge services.
receive.bridge_for_cross_chain: For cross-network transfers, use bridge services

confirmTxKey.confirm_tx_key: Confirma la transacci贸 a la clau SSP
confirmTxKey.info_1: To confirm the transaction on your SSP Key, open your SSP Key on your mobile phone and confirm the action. You can tap to refresh or scan the following QR code.
confirmTxKey.info_2: Per confirmar la transacci贸 a la teva clau SSP, obre la teva clau SSP al teu tel猫fon m貌bil i confirma l'acci贸. Pots tocar per actualitzar o utilitzar una entrada manual.

confirmPublicNoncesKey.confirm_public_nonces_key: Confirma els Nonces P煤blics a la clau SSP
confirmPublicNoncesKey.confirm_public_nonces_key_info: Per enviar una transacci贸 EVM, primer necessitem obtenir els nonces p煤blics de la clau SSP que s'utilitzen per a la construcci贸 de transaccions.
confirmPublicNoncesKey.confirm_public_nonces_key_info_2: Per confirmar els nonces p煤blics a la teva clau SSP, obre la teva clau SSP al teu tel猫fon m貌bil i confirma l'acci贸. Pots tocar per actualitzar o escanejar el seg眉ent codi QR.

navbar.remove_last_wallet_desc: Aquesta acci贸 eliminar la teva cartera m茅s recentment generada. Pots generar la mateixa cartera nova en qualsevol moment.
navbar.max_wallets: 42. La resposta a la pregunta definitiva sobre la vida, l'univers i tot. Has arribat al nombre mxim de carteres.

passwordConfirm.err_pw_not_valid_try: La contrasenya no 茅s vlida. Si us plau, intenta-ho de nou.
passwordConfirm.err_pc1: Codi PC1: Dades de la cartera mancants. Si us plau, restaura la teva cartera.
passwordConfirm.grant_access_info_1: Ests a punt d'accedir a informaci贸 sensible.

key.err_sync_fail: La sincronitzaci贸 ha fallat. L'adre莽a generada no coincideix. Torna a intentar-ho manualment i comprova que la mateixa adre莽a es construeixi tant a la cartera SSP com a la clau SSP. Tant la cartera SSP com la clau SSP han d'utilitzar frases llavor 煤niques i diferents.

key.err_k2: Codi K2: Alguna cosa va sortir malament mentre es desxifria la contrasenya.
key.err_k1: Codi K1: Alguna cosa va sortir malament mentre es desxifria la contrasenya.
key.cancel_sync_q: Cancel路lar la sincronitzaci贸 de la clau SSP?

key.sync_info_content: La cartera SSP no es pot utilitzar sense la clau SSP. Aix貌 t'accedir fora de la cartera SSP.
key.sync_info_1: La cartera SSP 茅s una cartera de doble signatura. Necessitars descarregar la clau SSP al teu dispositiu m貌bil per accedir a la teva cartera.
key.sync_info_2: Scan the following QR code using your 2FA SSP Key mobile app to synchronise your SSP Wallet with your SSP Key.
key.dual_factor_key_chain: Clau SSP de doble factor per {{chain}}

key.cancel_sync_q_chain: Cancel路lar la sincronitzaci贸 de la clau SSP per {{chain}}?

key.sync_info_2_chain: Escaneja el seg眉ent codi QR per sincronitzar la teva cartera SSP per a la cadena {{chain}} amb la teva clau SSP.
key.ssp_key_download_here: Don't have SSP Key? Click here to download!
key.ssp_key_2fa: SSP Key is a 2FA for your SSP Wallet
key.ssp_key_download: Download and synchronize your SSP Key with your SSP Wallet using scanning the QR code below using your Camera or QR code reader.
key.ssp_key_download_2: SSP Key has it's own SSP Key recovery seed phrase. This is a different seed phrase than your SSP Wallet.

chainsInfo.chain_requests_info: S'ha rebut una sol路licitud per obtenir informaci贸 sobre totes les cadenes integrades a SSP. Es compartiran les dades seg眉ents de cada cadena: id, nom, s铆mbol, decimals i chainId. No es comparteixen dades personals.
chainsInfo.chain_requests_info_user: S'ha rebut una sol路licitud per obtenir informaci贸 sobre les cadenes que la teva cartera SSP ha sincronitzat. Es compartiran les dades seg眉ents de cada cadena: id, nom, s铆mbol, decimals i chainId. Tot i que no es comparteixen dades personals, aquesta sol路licitud es pot utilitzar per obtenir informaci贸 sobre quines cadenes ests utilitzant.
chainsInfo.chain_requests_info_error: Error obtenint informaci贸 sobre les cadenes.

tokensInfo.tokens_requests_info: S'ha rebut una sol路licitud per obtenir informaci贸 sobre els tokens de la cadena {{chain}}. Es compartiran les dades seg眉ents de cada token: contracte, nom, s铆mbol, decimals. No es comparteixen dades personals.
tokensInfo.tokens_requests_info_error: Error obtenint informaci贸 sobre els tokens.

addressesInfo.addresses_requests_info: S'ha rebut una sol路licitud per obtenir la llista d'adreces per a la cadena {{chain}}. Aquesta sol路licitud compartir les adreces seleccionades. Exerciu precauci贸, ja que les teves adreces seran compartides amb el sol路licitant.
addressesInfo.addresses_requests_info_all: A request to get a list of addresses for all synchronised blockchains was received. This request will share your selected addresses as well as chain information such as id, name, symbol, decimals and chainId. Excersice caution as your addresses will be shared with the requester.
addressesInfo.addresses_requests_info_error: Error obtenint informaci贸 sobre les adreces.
addressesInfo.no_addresses: Cadena no sincronitzada. No s'han trobat adreces.

fusion.pa_info: Els Actius Paral路lels (PA) s贸n actius addicionals de Flux a diverses cadenes de blocs. Pots reclamar la teva recompensa d'actius paral路lels aqu铆 mitjan莽ant el pont Fusion. Fusion reclamar automticament les teves recompenses PA, les convertir en Flux i les enviar a la teva cartera Flux.
fusion.fusion_maintenance: Fusion est en manteniment. Torna a intentar-ho m茅s tard.
fusion.signature_error: Error en signar la sol路licitud Fusion. Torna a intentar-ho m茅s tard.

tokens.remove_token_info: Aquesta acci贸 amagar el token de la teva cartera. Pots afegir-lo de nou en qualsevol moment.

tokens.err_delete_token: Error en eliminar el token. Torna a intentar-ho.

buy_sell_crypto.consent_info: La compra i venda de criptomonedes es faciliten mitjan莽ant un servei de tercer proporcionat per Onramper. Tot i que SSP es compromet a garantir el mxim nivell de seguretat per als seus usuaris, no podem garantir la seguretat i la privadesa dels serveis de tercers.
buy_sell_crypto.consent_info_2: Reconec els riscos associats i desitjo continuar.
buy_sell_crypto.not_available_later: Les transaccions de criptomonedes actualment no estan disponibles. Torna a intentar-ho m茅s tard.

swap.estimated_amount: A causa de la volatilitat del mercat de criptomonedes, pots rebre m茅s o menys monedes del que esperaves inicialment.
swap.floating_rate_fluctuates: La taxa de mercat real a la qual sexecuta una transacci贸 comercial pot ser diferent de la mostrada en el moment denviar la teva ordre de comer莽. Aix貌 vol dir que el valor final del teu intercanvi podria ser diferent de lindicat inicialment.
swap.fixed_rate_stable: La taxa de mercat real a la qual sexecuta una transacci贸 comercial ser la mateixa que la mostrada en el moment denviar la teva ordre de comer莽. Aix貌 vol dir que el valor final del teu intercanvi ser el mateix que lindicat inicialment.
swap.proceeding_agree_tos: En continuar, acceptes els Termes del Servei
swap.rate_changed: La taxa ha canviat, revisa el teu import.
swap.error_creating_swap: Error en crear lintercanvi. La taxa pot haver canviat, revisa el teu import i prova de nou.
swap.error_fetching_swap_history: Error en recuperar lhistorial dintercanvis. Si us plau, prova de nou.

walletconnect.title: WalletConnect
walletconnect.connect_description: Connect to Web3 dApps by pasting WalletConnect URI from the dApp
walletconnect.confirm_disconnect: Are you sure you want to disconnect this session?
walletconnect.enter_uri: Please enter a valid WalletConnect URI
walletconnect.dapp_requests_signature: The dApp is requesting you to sign a message.
walletconnect.ssp_key_confirmation_needed: This action requires confirmation on your SSP Key mobile device.
walletconnect.dapp_requests_typed_data_signature: The dApp is requesting you to sign typed data.
walletconnect.dapp_requests_transaction: The dApp is requesting you to send a transaction.
walletconnect.need_public_nonces: Public nonces are required for EVM transactions. Please confirm on your SSP Key.
walletconnect.dapp_requests_chain_switch: The dApp is requesting to switch to a different chain.
walletconnect.switch_chain_warning: Switching chains will change your active addresses. Each chain has unique addresses in SSP Wallet.
walletconnect.chain_unique_addresses_desc: SSP Wallet generates different addresses for each blockchain network to ensure security. Using an address on the wrong blockchain may result in permanent loss of funds.
walletconnect.address_loss_warning: Important: This address is for {{chainName}} network only
walletconnect.sign_only_not_implemented: Transaction signing without broadcasting is not yet implemented
walletconnect.chain_not_supported: Chain {{chainName}} is not supported by SSP Wallet
walletconnect.dapp_wants_to_connect: A dApp wants to connect to your wallet
walletconnect.connection_warning: Only connect to dApps you trust. Connections can view your account balance and request transaction approvals. Interacting with malicious dApps may result in permanent loss of funds. Always verify the dApp's authenticity before connecting.
walletconnect.required_chains_warning: Please select all chains required by the dApp and at least one account for each selected chain.
walletconnect.unsupported_chains_warning: Some requested chains are not supported
walletconnect.unsynced_chains_warning: Some supported chains need to be synced first
walletconnect.no_compatible_chains_desc: This dApp requires chains that are either not supported or not synced with your SSP Wallet. Please sync the required chains first.
walletconnect.required_explanation: Required by this dApp - you must select these chains to connect
walletconnect.navigation_not_available: Please go to Send EVM page and try again. Navigation not available from current page.
walletconnect.step_1_approve_wallet: Step 1: Approve on SSP Wallet to proceed with signing
walletconnect.step_1_approve_wallet_info: Step 1: Approve on SSP Wallet. After this, approval on your SSP Key is required.
walletconnect.chain_not_synced: {{chainName}} is not synced with your SSP Key
walletconnect.chain_sync_required: Please sync {{chainName}} with your SSP Key before switching to this network
walletconnect.addressDeployed: Address is deployed and ready for use
walletconnect.addressNotDeployed: Address not deployed - limited functionality with dApps
walletconnect.account_abstraction_deployment_desc: Smart contract addresses require deployment (first transaction) for EIP-1271 signature verification. Non-deployed addresses may have limited dApp compatibility.
walletconnect.defaulting_to_ethereum_desc: This dApp didn't specify any chains or requested an invalid chain (Chain ID 0). We're defaulting to Ethereum (Chain ID 1) to ensure proper functionality.
walletconnect.chain_compatibility_desc_1: You are currently on {{chainName}} (non-EVM chain), but this dApp requires EVM blockchain functionality.
walletconnect.chain_compatibility_desc_2: When you approve signing requests, we will share your Ethereum addresses instead. You can switch to an EVM chain anytime in your wallet.
walletconnect.address_not_found_current_chain: Address not found in current chain. Chain switch should have been performed before signing.
walletconnect.address_not_found_transaction: Address not found in current chain. Chain switch should have been performed before transaction.
walletconnect.navigation_failed: Unable to navigate to transaction screen
walletconnect.signing_chain_switch_desc: This signing request will switch to {{chainName}} chain.
walletconnect.address_different_chain: The address exists on a different chain than currently active.
walletconnect.eth_sign_transaction_not_supported: eth_signTransaction is not supported by Account Abstraction wallets. Please use eth_sendTransaction instead.
walletconnect.eth_sign_transaction_error: eth_signTransaction is not supported by Account Abstraction wallets. Account Abstraction wallets use UserOperations instead of traditional transactions. Please use eth_sendTransaction to execute the transaction directly.

walletconnect_tx_modal.erc20_transfer_warning: This will transfer tokens. Amount and recipient are encoded in the data.
walletconnect_tx_modal.erc20_transfer_from_warning: This will transfer tokens from another address.
walletconnect_tx_modal.erc20_approve_warning: This will approve token spending. Check the amount carefully.
walletconnect_tx_modal.nft_approval_warning: This will approve all your NFTs for trading. Use with caution.
walletconnect_tx_modal.unknown_function_warning: This is an unknown contract function. Verify carefully before proceeding.
walletconnect_tx_modal.chain_switch_desc: This transaction will switch to {{chainName}} chain.
walletconnect_tx_modal.address_different_chain: The address exists on a different chain than currently active.

tutorial.wallet_synchronized_desc: Your SSP Wallet is now ready! Would you like a quick tour to learn about all the features?
tutorial.click_highlighted: Click the highlighted element to continue
tutorial.tutorial_reset_success: Tutorial has been reset. You can start it again from the help button.
tutorial.switch_to_bitcoin_first: Please switch to Bitcoin blockchain first to start the tutorial. Use the chain selector at the top of the page.
tutorial.err_tutorial_wallet_data: Cannot start tutorial - wallet data not available. Please try again.
tutorial.navigating_to_home: Navigating to home page to start tutorial...
tutorial.waiting_wallet_data: Waiting for wallet data to load...
tutorial.tutorial_cancelled: Tutorial cancelled. You can restart it anytime using the help button.
tutorial.tutorial_cancelled_wrong_chain: Tutorial cancelled: You selected a different chain. The tutorial requires Ethereum to continue. You can restart it from the menu.

welcome_overview.title: Welcome to SSP Wallet!
welcome_overview.content: You've successfully synced SSP Wallet with SSP Key and connected to the Bitcoin blockchain! Your wallet is now ready to use. Here you can see your wallet address and balance. Always verify that the wallet address displayed here matches the address shown on your SSP Key device.

multi_chain_intro.title: Multiple Blockchain Support
multi_chain_intro.content: SSP Wallet supports multiple blockchains! This dropdown shows your current wallet and chain. Click on it to access chain switching options.

find_switch_chain.title: Switch Chain Button
find_switch_chain.content: Perfect! Now click on "Switch Chain" to open the blockchain selection where you can choose different networks.

select_ethereum.title: Select Ethereum
select_ethereum.content: Great! The chain selection modal is open. Now click on Ethereum to switch to the Ethereum blockchain. This will trigger synchronization with the Ethereum network.

ethereum_sync_waiting.title: Sync with SSP Key
ethereum_sync_waiting.content: To begin synchronizing with the Ethereum blockchain, scan the QR code with your SSP Key. This will enable your wallet to interact with Ethereum, its tokens and dApps.
ethereum_sync_waiting.sync_hint: The tutorial will continue automatically once sync is complete.

ethereum_tokens.title: Welcome to Ethereum!
ethereum_tokens.content: You're now on Ethereum! This chain supports smart contracts and ERC-20 tokens. The Tokens section lets you manage your token portfolio - view, add, or search for popular tokens like USDT and USDC.

add_token_demo.title: Adding Tokens
add_token_demo.content: Click here to add new tokens. You can search for popular tokens like USDT or add custom tokens by entering their contract address.

receive_intro.title: Receiving Funds
receive_intro.content: Click Receive to get your Ethereum address. This address can receive ETH and any ERC-20 tokens. You can copy the address or use the QR code.

send_intro.title: Sending Funds
send_intro.content: The Send button opens the transaction interface where you can send cryptocurrency to other addresses. It includes fields for recipient, amount, and fees.

swap_feature.title: Swap Feature
swap_feature.content: Exchange one cryptocurrency for another instantly. Swap between different tokens or convert ETH to tokens.

buy_sell_feature.title: Buy & Sell Crypto
buy_sell_feature.content: Purchase cryptocurrency with fiat currency or sell your crypto for cash. This integrates with trusted payment providers.

activity_section.title: Transaction History
activity_section.content: The Activity section shows your complete transaction history. View sent, received, and pending transactions with full details.

activity_explanation.title: Your Transactions
activity_explanation.content: Here you can see all your transactions - incoming, outgoing, and pending. Click any transaction for detailed information including fees and confirmations.

contacts_section.title: Contacts Management
contacts_section.content: The Contacts section lets you save frequently used addresses with custom names. This makes sending funds easier and safer.

contacts_explanation.title: Your Address Book
contacts_explanation.content: Save addresses you send to frequently. Each contact has a name and address, making transactions more convenient and reducing errors.

extended_menu_intro.title: Advanced Menu Features
extended_menu_intro.content: This menu provides access to advanced features: WalletConnect for connecting to dApps, Address Details, SSP Wallet Details, Settings and more. The lock icon on the right securely logs you out.

address_management.title: Wallets Management
address_management.content: This dropdown manages multiple addresses per blockchain. You can create new addresses, switch between existing ones, or remove the last created address. Each address is independent with its own balance and transaction history.

tutorial_complete.title: Tutorial Complete!
tutorial_complete.content: Congratulations! You now know how to use all major features of SSP Wallet. Explore confidently and manage your crypto securely.
